channel.title: The suggestions forum
channel.description:
Has been temporarily disabled. There was a bug in SMF found that allowed anyone to view replies to topics in that board, which led to some controversies. Until the bug is patched on this forum, the board will have to remain hidden. All active discussion in it will be picked up after the bug is fixed.
Edit: This also includes the Moparcraft suggestions forum.
Thanks.

item.title: The suggestions forum
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Glad the bug has been dealt with :).

Read full topic

item.title: The suggestions forum
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:3, topic:454032”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=556906.msg4075847#msg4075847 date=1344819351]
Sorry to hear of the bug, Taharok.

However, I did have a domain in that board waiting to be approved, what should I do in the mean time?
[/quote]

Consider it approved.[/quote]

Thank-you.

Read full topic
